p: Density functional theory (DFT) calculations were performed in the gas phase on the neutral molecule, using the Amsterdam Density Functional (ADF) 2018 programme [ 5]. Results obtained by five different functionals in combination with the TZP (Triple Î¶ polarized) basis set are reported, namely: OLYP (Handy-Cohen and Lee-Yang-Parr) [ [6], [7], [8], [9]], B3LYP-D3 [ 7, 10], PW91 [ 11], BP86-D3 [ 12, 13] and M06-L [ 14, 15]. Input coordinates were constructed using ChemCraft [ 16]. Chemcraft and ADF gui was used to visualize the ADF output and t21 files respectively. The optimized coordinates, as well as an example input file, are provided in the supplementary information.
